column3: Provision of Due Diligence for North of Tyne Inward Investment Fund (NTIIF)
column4: North of Tyne Combined Authority (NTCA) is seeking to appoint an organisation to provide due diligence services for the North of Tyne Inward Investment Fund (NTIIF). Due diligence services may also be required for other grant or loan awards provided by the North of Tyne Combined Authority under this contract and terms.
